${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Surge.NAME: Surge
${modID}:Surge.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain [E]  [E]  [E]. NL Gain unspent [E] next turn.
${modID}:Surge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain [E]  [E]  [E]  [E]. NL Gain unspent [E] next turn.

${modID}:BalancedCalm.NAME: Balanced Calm
${modID}:BalancedCalm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill or Curse, gain !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart.

${modID}:Frolic.NAME: Frolic
${modID}:Frolic.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw 1 card, give it +!M! damage and +!M! Block this combat.

${modID}:MilkBoost.NAME: Milk Boost
${modID}:MilkBoost.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E]. NL Gain 3 Regen.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I do not have enough Lion's Heart.

${modID}:IndomitableMight.NAME: Indomitable Might
${modID}:IndomitableMight.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Vulnerable.
${modID}:IndomitableMight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to double your Vulnerable.

${modID}:WhiskerWalker.NAME: Whisker Walker
${modID}:WhiskerWalker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a ${modID}:Reckless card, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:Opportunity.NAME: Opportunity
${modID}:Opportunity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever Vulnerable is applied to ANYONE, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
${modID}:Opportunity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever Vulnerable is applied to ANYONE, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.

${modID}:BreakDefences.NAME: Break Defences
${modID}:BreakDefences.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable to you and the target.

${modID}:CautiousImpulse.NAME: Cautious Impulse
${modID}:CautiousImpulse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Caution. NL ${modID}:Caution no longer decreases. NL ${modID}:Reckless. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FloatAndFall.NAME: Float and Fall
${modID}:FloatAndFall.DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose 1 Strength for every !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart on you. NL Gain 5 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart.

${modID}:ParalysingGlare.NAME: Paralysing Glare
${modID}:ParalysingGlare.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 ${modID}:Weary. NL Gain Strength equal to Vulnerable on enemy. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:ParalysingGlare.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 ${modID}:Weary. NL Gain Strength equal to Vulnerable on enemy.

${modID}:NeverDown.NAME: Never Down
${modID}:NeverDown.DESCRIPTION: Gain 4 Temporary Strength. NL Gain 4 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Draw 2 cards. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:NeverDown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 6 Temporary Strength. NL Gain 6 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Draw 3 cards. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StartSmall.NAME: Start Small
${modID}:StartSmall.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL At the end of combat, if you have at least
${modID}:Lion's_Heart, permanently increase this card's ${modID}:Lion's_Heart gain by 1.

${modID}:BringerOfBadLuck.NAME: Bringer of Bad Luck
${modID}:BringerOfBadLuck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard 1 card. NL Next turn, gain 1 [E].

${modID}:SmoulderingSneer.NAME: Smouldering Sneer
${modID}:SmoulderingSneer.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !M! Temporary Strength and 2 Vulnerable.
${modID}:SmoulderingSneer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !M! Temporary Strength, 2 Vulnerable and 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:FacingDown.NAME: Facing Down
${modID}:FacingDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL At the end of your turn, Retain 1 card and reduce its cost by 1 for the rest of combat.

${modID}:FeralScream.NAME: Feral Scream
${modID}:FeralScream.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Gain 1 Weak. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card.
${modID}:FeralScream.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Gain 1 ${modID}:Weary. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:BrushWithDeath.NAME: Brush With Death
${modID}:BrushWithDeath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Draw 1 card. NL ${modID}:Reckless. NL If you have a Curse in your hand, ignore ${modID}:Reckless damage.

${modID}:Grace.NAME: Grace
${modID}:Grace.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity for every !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart on you. NL Do this X+1 times. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity for every !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart on you (
). NL Do this X+1 times. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:DeceivedIdentity.NAME: Deceived Identity
${modID}:DeceivedIdentity.DESCRIPTION: Choose to pay [E] or !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 9 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart.

${modID}:KillingField.NAME: Killing Field
${modID}:KillingField.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Strength.

${modID}:Illusive.NAME: Illusive
${modID}:Illusive.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in hand to remove from deck. NL This card is also removed. NL ${modID}:Reckless.
${modID}:Illusive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card in hand to remove from deck. NL This card is also removed. NL Gain !M! Max HP. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
${modID}:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Exploded.NAME: Exploded
${modID}:Exploded.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to EVERYONE. NL Upon pickup, Upgrade a random card in your deck. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Burned.NAME: Burned
${modID}:Burned.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Weak. NL Give 2 random attack cards in hand +3 damage this combat. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Crushed.NAME: Crushed
${modID}:Crushed.DESCRIPTION: A random enemy gains 2 Temporary Strength. Gain 6 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Humiliated.NAME: Humiliated
${modID}:Humiliated.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, lose !M! Strength this turn. NL Gain 1 Strength next turn. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Trampled.NAME: Trampled
${modID}:Trampled.DESCRIPTION: When drawn, gain 1 Frail. NL Draw 2 cards. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Mauled.NAME: Mauled
${modID}:Mauled.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Temporary Strength. Lose 1 Strength next turn. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Choked.NAME: Choked
${modID}:Choked.DESCRIPTION: Gain 5 Gold. A random card in your hand costs +1 for the turn. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:ShakeOff.NAME: Shake Off
${modID}:ShakeOff.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand to Exhaust. NL Gain !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart and an additional !B! Block and !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart for each [E] it cost.

${modID}:RainyDay.NAME: Rainy Day
${modID}:RainyDay.DESCRIPTION: Every 3 times you gain Vulnerable, draw 1 card.
${modID}:RainyDay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Every 3 times you gain Vulnerable, draw 1 card. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable and 1 ${modID}:Unfazed.

${modID}:ThroughTheFlames.NAME: Through the Flames
${modID}:ThroughTheFlames.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Draw 1 card. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Howl.NAME: Howl
${modID}:Howl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw 1 card, it costs 2 this turn.

${modID}:Dupe.NAME: Dupe
${modID}:Dupe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 3 Strength this turn. NL Enemy loses !M! Dexterity.
${modID}:Dupe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 3 Strength this turn. NL Enemy loses !M! Dexterity and Strength.

${modID}:LickWounds.NAME: Lick Wounds
${modID}:LickWounds.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heal for !M!% of your missing HP. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
${modID}:BorrowedTime.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are able, lose 1 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart and draw 1 card.
${modID}:BorrowedTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL At the start of your turn, if you are able, lose 1 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart and draw 1 card.

${modID}:KeenSenses.NAME: Keen Senses
${modID}:KeenSenses.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Curse, gain !M! Block.

${modID}:BattleForm.NAME: Battle Form
${modID}:BattleForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Temporary Strength per 8 ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Nap.NAME: Nap
${modID}:Nap.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !B! Block, and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies, then skip your turn. NL In 2 turns, gain 5 Temporary Strength and heal for half of your ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Nap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !B! Block, and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies, then skip your turn. NL In 2 turns, gain 7 Temporary Strength and heal for half of your ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:BackAlley.NAME: Back Alley
${modID}:BackAlley.DESCRIPTION: The first card you draw each turn costs 1 less that turn.
${modID}:BackAlley.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first !M! cards you draw each turn cost 1 less that turn.

${modID}:CoughUpFurball.NAME: Cough up Furball
${modID}:CoughUpFurball.DESCRIPTION: For each Curse in your hand, draw !M! cards. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable.

${modID}:AncientTeachings.NAME: Ancient Teachings
${modID}:AncientTeachings.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card in your hand, gain !M! Temporary Strength and an additional !M! Temporary Strength for each [E] it cost.
${modID}:AncientTeachings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 1 card in your hand, gain !M! Temporary Strength and an additional !M! Temporary Strength for each [E] it cost. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:LingeringTingle.NAME: Lingering Tingle
${modID}:LingeringTingle.DESCRIPTION: Adds a random ${modID}:Reckless card to your hand. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:LingeringTingle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Adds a random Upgraded ${modID}:Reckless card to your hand. NL Gain !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FromWithin.NAME: From Within
${modID}:FromWithin.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to a third of your ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable.
${modID}:FromWithin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable.

${modID}:ManicIgnorance.NAME: Manic Ignorance
${modID}:ManicIgnorance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! cards. NL If this card is Exhausted, trigger its effects.

${modID}:Agility.NAME: Agility
${modID}:Agility.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block per Vulnerable on you.
${modID}:Agility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block per Vulnerable on you. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable and 1 ${modID}:Unfazed.

${modID}:Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
${modID}:Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain an additional !M! Block per [E] cost in hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Block. NL Gain an additional !M! Block per [E] cost in hand.

${modID}:AllFours.NAME: All Fours
${modID}:AllFours.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose a card in hand. It costs +1 this turn.

${modID}:FerociousSwipe.NAME: Ferocious Swipes
${modID}:FerociousSwipe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL ${modID}:Reckless. NL Add a copy of this card into your hand that costs 1 more and is Ethereal and Exhausts.

${modID}:StaticCharge.NAME: Static Charge
${modID}:StaticCharge.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand to Exhaust. NL Deal !D! damage and an additional !D! for each [E] it cost.

${modID}:PlayWithFood.NAME: Play With Food
${modID}:PlayWithFood.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable next turn.
${modID}:PlayWithFood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable next turn.

${modID}:BloodOfKings.NAME: Blood Of Kings
${modID}:BloodOfKings.DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heal !M! HP for each Vulnerable on you.
${modID}:BloodOfKings.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of combat, heal !M! HP for each Vulnerable on you. NL Gain 4 Vulnerable.

${modID}:Clowder.NAME: Clowder
${modID}:Clowder.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw 2 additional cards and gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Clowder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Next turn, draw 3 additional cards and gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CloseTheGap.NAME: Close the Gap
${modID}:CloseTheGap.DESCRIPTION: For the next !M! turns, ALL enemies lose 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.
${modID}:CloseTheGap.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For the next !M! turns, and right now, ALL enemies lose 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

${modID}:BloodRush.NAME: Blood Rush
${modID}:BloodRush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, hits an additional time for each !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. NL Gain 3 Vulnerable.

${modID}:FearScent.NAME: Fear Scent
${modID}:FearScent.DESCRIPTION: If you have a ${modID}:Reckless card in hand, gain !M! ${modID}:Caution. NL Draw 1 card.

${modID}:Unfazed.NAME: Unfazed
${modID}:Unfazed.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${modID}:Unfazed. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable to EVERYONE.

${modID}:TwistTheBlade.NAME: Twist The Blade
${modID}:TwistTheBlade.DESCRIPTION: Pay !M! ${modID}:Lion's_Heart. Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has Vulnerable, deal !D! damage again.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I do not have enough Lion's Heart.

${modID}:TasteTheAir.NAME: Taste the Air
${modID}:TasteTheAir.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Permanently increase this card's Temporary Strength gain by 2. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:TasteTheAir.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Permanently increase this card's Temporary Strength gain by 3. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:FatalBite.NAME: Fatal Bite
${modID}:FatalBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Raise your Max HP by 5. NL Choose a card in hand, it costs 1 less and deals !M! more damage this combat.
${modID}:FatalBite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Raise your Max HP by 7. NL Choose a card in hand, it costs 2 less and deals !M! more damage this combat.

${modID}:OneOfThePride.NAME: One of the Pride
${modID}:OneOfThePride.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain ${modID}:Lion's_Heart equal to the amount of unblocked damage dealt

${modID}:Valiance.NAME: Valiance
${modID}:Valiance.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Block per Strength on you. NL Gain 2 Regen. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:Valiance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Block per Strength on you +4. NL Gain 2 Regen. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:LeaveForDead.NAME: Leave for Dead
${modID}:LeaveForDead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Next turn, lose 1 Strength. NL ${modID}:Reckless.
${modID}:LeaveForDead.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 4 times. Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Next turn, lose 1 Strength. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Unsheath.NAME: Unsheath
${modID}:Unsheath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL ${modID}:Reckless.

${modID}:Nourishment.NAME: Nourishment
${modID}:Nourishment.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Raise your Max HP by !M!. NL 20% chance for a random enemy to gain 2 Strength next turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I am full! I've already eaten 10 Nourishments!

${modID}:DinDins.NAME: Din Dins
${modID}:DinDins.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn add a *Nourishment into your hand. NL Gain 3 Regen.

${modID}:FangsBared.NAME: Fangs Bared
${modID}:FangsBared.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card with ${modID}:Reckless, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

${modID}:StandUpStraight.NAME: Stand up Straight
${modID}:StandUpStraight.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in hand, it gains +!M! Block this combat. NL ${modID}:Reckless. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:CleansingRay.NAME: Cleansing Ray
${modID}:CleansingRay.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. (Increased by !M! for each ${modID}:Reckless card in your hand). NL This card gains !M! Block for the rest of combat for each ${modID}:Reckless card in your hand.

${modID}:WarmGlow.NAME: Warm Glow
${modID}:WarmGlow.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Temporary ${modID}:Caution. NL Gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:WarmGlow.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Temporary ${modID}:Caution. NL The first time you play this card, gain !M! Regen. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:WitchsFamiliar.NAME: Witch's Familiar
${modID}:WitchsFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to EVERYONE. NL Gain 2 Regen. NL Exhaust.
${modID}:WitchsFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to EVERYONE. NL Gain 3 Regen. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:StreetSmart.NAME: Street Smart
${modID}:StreetSmart.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Weak and 1 ${modID}:Weary.

${modID}:Jolt.NAME: Jolt
${modID}:Jolt.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 ${modID}:Caution. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this combat.
${modID}:Jolt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 ${modID}:Caution. NL Reduce the cost of a random card in your hand by 1 this combat. NL Gain [E].

${modID}:Hunt.NAME: Hunt
${modID}:Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add a *Nourishment to your hand.

${modID}:SalubriousShine.NAME: Salubrious Shine
${modID}:SalubriousShine.DESCRIPTION: The next !M! times you play a card this turn, gain 1 Max HP. NL Exhaust.

${modID}:ShadowDancer.NAME: Shadow Dancer
${modID}:ShadowDancer.DESCRIPTION: Curses cost 1 more to play, when played they provide [E] and draw 1 card.
${modID}:ShadowDancer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Curses cost 1 more to play, when played they provide [E] and draw 1 card. NL Draw 1 card.
